# +(_:_:)

**Operator**

Combines the elements of two index paths into a single index path.

## Declaration

```swift
static func + (lhs: IndexPath, rhs: IndexPath) -> IndexPath
```

## Adding Nodes

- **+=(_:_:)**: Appends the elements of another index path to this index path.

items.description: Appends the elements of another index path to this index path.
